children.text:
The approach in the code:
We have two pointers: a starting at -1 (so the next candy on the left is at index 0) and b starting at n (so the next candy on the right is at index n-1).

children.text:
We also have:
  suma: the total weight Alice has eaten so far (initially 0)
  sumb: the total weight Bob has eaten so far (initially 0)
  cur: the current total count of candies eaten (initially 0)
  ans: the best total count of candies eaten so far when the two sums were equal.
children.label: code_analysis
